label: AB3_mP16_14_e_3e-002
title: ``$P2_1/c$''-B$_{2}$H$_{6}$ Structure
comments:
(Mark, 1925) studied a variety of B$_{2}$H$_{6}$ structures, including the one given {\em Strukturbericht} designation $D4_{1}$ by (Ewald,1931). Very little information was given about this structure, other than Ewalds's statement ``The position of the boron atoms is exactly the same as that of the Hg atoms in the \href{current_web_home_dir/A_hR1_166_a-002}{A10 ($\alpha$-Hg) structure}.'' (Yao, 2011) found the current structure computationally, and note that it is likely the structure found by (Mark, 1925). 
 This structure shares the same AFLOW designation, AB3\_mP16\_14\_e\_3e, as the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_mP16_14_e_3e-003}{$\beta$-B$_{2}$H$_{6}$} structure described by (Smith, 1965).  They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
